Welcome to PyStaff’s documentation!¶

PyStaff fits model templates to optical and near-infrared spectra of nearby galaxies. These pages will give you a quick introduction on how it works. It’s MIT-licensed, been used most recently in the paper Vaughan et al 2018b and is being actively updated and developed on Github.
